data.Jiří Hlaváček:
Jiří is a stable struggling artist who enjoys spreading fake news on Facebook.

Jiří Hlaváček is a 45-year-old struggling artist who enjoys spreading fake news on Facebook, working on cars and theatre. He is stable and creative, but can also be very cowardly and a bit moody.

He is a Czech Christian. He has a degree in chemistry.

Physically, Jiří is in good shape. He is tall with fair skin, grey hair and green eyes. He has asymmetrical ears.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. After his mother died when he was young, he was raised by his father

He is currently married to Lena Cindy Castillo. Lena is 2 years older than him and works as a senior programmer.

Jiří has three children with 2 two different partners: wife Lena and ex-girlfriend Lexie: aged 2, Nina aged 6 and Tiffany aged 28.

Jiří's best friend is a struggling artist called Nell Mclaughlin. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Lydia Gonzales and Ellie Hunt. They enjoy ferret racing together.

physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: full-length, grandiloquent, leggy, long-legged, slim, stately, statuesque, tall

personality.Hobbies: spreading fake news on Facebook, working on cars, theatre, ferret racing, appearing in the background on TV, writing, worship

background.Early years: Jiří grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. After his mother died when he was young, he was raised by his father
background.Formative years: Jiří got is first job as a kitchen assistant at age 18. Jiří went to univeristy and got a degree.

hlaváček.Relationship: They do not get along well

tiffany_natalie_hlaváček.Relationship: They do not get along well

nell_peggy_mclaughlin.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

lydia_daria_gonzales.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

lee_miles_carter.Relationship: Jiří has always looked up to Lee.

aurora_effie_carter.Relationship: Aurora has always looked out for Jiří.

kai_kathy_carter.Relationship: Jiří and Kai get on well despite the age gap.

zoe_adrian_hlaváček.Relationship: Jiří and Zoe grew up in separate homes but see each other a lot. Zoe has always looked out for Jiří.

alec_darius_hlaváček.Relationship: Jiří and Alec grew up in separate homes but see each other a lot. Jiří idolises Alec.

lexie_lia_paterson.Reason for breakup: Jiří got fed up of being taken advantage of

diane_angela_doyle.Reason for breakup: Diane wanted to be with somebody less conventional
diane_angela_doyle.Relationship: They remained friends until she died

timeline.1976: Mother, Charmaine Sonia Hlaváček (née Carter) dies aged 35 (infection)
timeline.1990: Gets together with Lexie Lia Paterson.
timeline.1991: Daughter, Tiffany Natalie Hlaváček is born Relationship with Lexie Lia Paterson ends (Jiří got fed up of being taken advantage of).
timeline.1992: Starts work at The Snail and Cucumber at kitchen assistant
timeline.1993: Gets together with Diane Angela Doyle.
timeline.1995: Resigns from job as kitchen assistant at The Snail and Cucumber Starts work at The Royal Inn at sous chef
timeline.1997: Relationship with Diane Angela Doyle ends (Diane wanted to be with somebody less conventional).
timeline.2001: Gets together with Marie Tianna Li.
timeline.2004: Relationship with Marie Tianna Li ends (Marie wanted somebody less cowardly).
timeline.2006: Gets together with Lena Cindy Castillo.
timeline.2008: Resigns from job as sous chef at The Royal Inn Starts work at Studi-oo! at cleaner at a studio
timeline.2011: Resigns from job as cleaner at a studio at Studi-oo! Starts self-employment as struggling artist
timeline.2013: Daughter, Nina Emilie Hlaváček is born
timeline.2014: Ex-girlfriend, Diane Angela Doyle dies aged 42 (heart disease)
timeline.2016: Marries Lena Cindy Castillo. Father, Chris Gabriel Hlaváček dies aged 80 (heart disease)
